frontMatter.title: Brand Guide
frontMatter.metaDescription: Define the brand personality of the product, including composition, design & visual theme, general look-and-feel, logo, name, etc.

checklist.question: MI_Test_Demo-What is the unique message that you want to convey with your branding?
checklist.expectation: MI_Test_Demo-A simple but a powerful message that is instantly comprehendible.

checklist.question: How do you position your brand visually?
checklist.expectation: A consistent color code, distinguishable logo and other UI elements has to be in place and people needs to instantly identify your brand via these elements.

checklist.question: What is the target audience of the product?
checklist.expectation: The team has identified the target demographies clearly and should be aware of the preferences of those demographies.
